title: Projectile motion - distances during free fall

content.question: An object is dropped from a tall building at time <math alttext="t equals 0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math> and reaches the ground at <math alttext="t equals 10 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the distance <math alttext="delta x sub 0 minus 2, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> traveled by the object between <math alttext="t equals 0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math> and <math alttext="t equals 2 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>, the distance <math alttext="delta x sub 4 minus 6, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> traveled between <math alttext="t equals 4 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math> and <math alttext="t equals 6 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>, and the distance <math alttext="delta x sub 8 minus 10, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> traveled between <math alttext="t equals 8 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math> and <math alttext="t equals 10 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="delta x sub 0 minus 2, end sub, is greater than delta x sub 4 minus 6, end sub, which is greater than delta x sub 8 minus 10, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta x sub 0 minus 2, end sub, equals delta x sub 4 minus 6, end sub, which equals delta x sub 8 minus 10, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta x sub 8 minus 10, end sub, is greater than delta x sub 4 minus 6, end sub, which is greater than delta x sub 0 minus 2, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, delta x sub 0 minus 2, end sub, equals delta x sub 8 minus 10, end sub, close parenthesis, is greater than delta x sub 4 minus 6, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="delta x sub 8 minus 10, end sub, is greater than delta x sub 4 minus 6, end sub, which is greater than delta x sub 0 minus 2, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>x</mi><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
